Name: scrollTop
Desc: Gets or sets the vertical scroll position of the first node, with an option to increment.
LongDesc: Controls the vertical scrolling position of elements. When called without parameters, returns the current vertical scroll position of the first element. When provided with a value, sets the vertical scroll position for all elements, respecting maximum scroll boundaries. The increment parameter allows for relative scrolling (adding to current position) rather than absolute positioning. This method is essential for programmatic scrolling in overflow containers, panels, or implementing custom scroll behaviors.
